Class InventoryManagement

Object
InventoryManagement
All Implemented Interfaces:
PendingManagement, ReplenishmentService
public class InventoryManagement extends Object implements ReplenishmentService, PendingManagement
The InventoryManagement class provides comprehensive functionality for managing inventory items, including viewing, submitting replenishment requests, restocking, and handling pending requests.

This class implements both ReplenishmentService and PendingManagement interfaces, allowing it to manage items that are pending approval, as well as items that need restocking or have low stock thresholds.

It interacts with dataProcessor to manage inventory data and store replenishment requests. This class can be extended to support additional inventory-related functionalities.

Note: Ensure "Medicine_List.csv" and "Replenishment_Requests.csv" files are available for correct functionality.

Since:
2024-11-6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sia Yi Zhen

    • viewItems

      public void viewItems()
      Displays all items in the inventory by reading from "Medicine_List.csv".

    • submitReplenishmentRequest

      public void submitReplenishmentRequest(String itemName, int quantity, String requestedBy)
      Submits a new replenishment request, specifying the item name, requested quantity, and requester’s ID. Generates a unique request ID and sets the initial status as "Pending".
      Specified by:
      submitReplenishmentRequest in interface ReplenishmentService
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to replenish.
      quantity - The quantity requested.
      requestedBy - The ID of the individual who requested the replenishment.

    • updateLowStockThreshold

      public void updateLowStockThreshold(String itemName, int newThreshold)
      Updates the low stock threshold for a specified item.
      Specified by:
      updateLowStockThreshold in interface ReplenishmentService
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item whose threshold is being updated.
      newThreshold - The new low stock threshold for the item.

    • restockItemByName

      public boolean restockItemByName(String medicineName, int quantity)
      Restocks a specified quantity of a medicine by its name.
      Specified by:
      restockItemByName in interface ReplenishmentService
      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine to restock.
      quantity - The quantity to add to the current stock.
      Returns:
      true if the medicine was restocked successfully; false if the medicine was not found in the inventory.

    • restockItemByRequestID

      public boolean restockItemByRequestID(String requestID, String approvedBy)
      Approves a replenishment request by its ID and updates the inventory stock.
      Specified by:
      restockItemByRequestID in interface ReplenishmentService
      Parameters:
      requestID - The unique identifier for the replenishment request.
      approvedBy - The ID of the person approving the request.
      Returns:
      true if successfully processed; false if not found or already processed.

    • checkLowStockForItem

      public void checkLowStockForItem(String itemName)
      Checks if a specific item has low stock based on its threshold.
      Parameters:
      itemName - The name of the item to check.

    • getStockLevel

      public int getStockLevel(String medicineName)
      Retrieves the current stock level for a specified medicine.

      This method searches the inventory data for the specified medicine and returns its current quantity in stock. If the medicine is not found, it returns 0 to indicate no stock available.

      Parameters:
      medicineName - The name of the medicine to check the stock level for.
      Returns:
      The current stock level of the specified medicine, or 0 if the medicine is not found.

    • viewPendingItems

      public void viewPendingItems()
      Displays all pending replenishment requests by reading from "Replenishment_Requests.csv".
      Specified by:
      viewPendingItems in interface PendingManagement

    • handleAllPending

      public void handleAllPending(String approvedBy)
      Processes and approves all pending replenishment requests, updating the stock levels and marking each request as approved by the specified individual.
      Specified by:
      handleAllPending in interface PendingManagement
      Parameters:
      approvedBy - The ID of the individual approving the pending requests.
